name: vscode-mcp-pr-command
description: VS Code extension to install and run mcp-pr-command easily (registers a command to start the MCP server).

mcpPrCommand.autoStart.description: Automatically start the MCP server when VS Code starts.

mcpPrCommand.cardLinkWebSite.description: Base website used to generate card links (e.g. https://link.com)

mcpPrCommand.cartPathLinkReplacePattern.description: Pattern used to build card paths (e.g. $1/card/$2/details)

mcpPrCommand.branchCardIdExtractPattern.description: Regex pattern used to extract card ids from branch names

mcpPrCommand.complementaryMcpDescription.description: Optional description appended to the MCP introduction

mcpPrCommand.registrationCommand.description: Optional VS Code command to call to register this MCP server with a host extension (e.g. 'mcp.registerServer'). If set, the extension will call this command with a payload describing the server.

mcpPrCommand.registrationPayload.description: Optional JSON payload to pass to the registration command. If omitted the extension will pass a default descriptor with name/command/args.

scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:format && pnpm run lint:style
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run lint:format:fix && pnpm run lint:style:fix
